EmailTemplate.subject: Direct-To Aviation Newsletter | May
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.honeywellanalytics.com]]> Pilot Section: Unraveling Continuous Descent Final Approach, VNAV Using the MDA as a DA and Derived Decision Altitudes Part 2: Executing the Missed Approach This article discusses the difference between doing a non-precision approach to an MDA using conventional “dive and drive” and using a DDA...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/05/vnav-using-the-mda?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Familiarization Training Update Primus Elite Advanced Features and NZ FMS 6.1 Features Deep Dive Training Videos Now Available Honeywell is excited to announce two new Familiarization Training videos available on the Pilot Gateway...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/05/familiarization-training-update?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Flight Management: Important Reminder for Gulfstream Operators Upgraded to ASC 912 or Later Operators Can Receive an Unrestricted Navigation Database Gulfstream operators upgraded to ASC 912 or later can receive an unrestricted navigation database...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/05/reminder-gulfstream-operators?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Headache-free budgeting when you need it most Avoid costly surprises and downtime with one of the industry’s most popular plans. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-auxiliary-power-units-business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Maintenance Section: Honeywell’s Service Center in Brazil Provides specialized support to business aviation operators. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/05/honeywell-service-center-in-brazil?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Down Time Is Upgrade Time We upgrade solutions and incentives to save you money and time. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Customer and Product Support: Operator Brings Coffee and Supplies to Medical Workers, Police and Fire Stations in Mexico These past few months have been hard and trying for many, it is a bright light to see individuals from our close-knit aviation community rise as heroes to help those in need. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/05/operator-brings-coffee-and-supplies-in-mexico?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Time Well Spent: Nine Ways to Use Aircraft Downtime During the Pandemic We asked our engine and avionics experts for their recommendations on making the most of downtime. Here are some of their tips. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/04/time-well-spent-aircraft-downtime?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]> © 2020 Honeywell International Inc. <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> 115 Tabor Road, Morris Plains, NJ 07950
